headline: Influential Johnson Aide Quits U.K. Government
text: LONDON — Dominic Cummings, the influential strategist who masterminded the Brexit campaign in 2016 and helped vault Boris Johnson to 10 Downing Street, abruptly quit as his chief adviser on Friday, after days of fierce infighting over the role of hard-line Brexiteers who surround the prime minister.
snippet: Mr. Cummings, who masterminded the Brexit campaign in 2016 and helped vault Mr. Johnson into office, quit amid fierce infighting.
